text: Muricauda lutaonensis is a Gram-negative, aerobic, rod-shaped moderately thermophilic and non-motile bacterium of the genus Muricauda which has been isolated from a hot spring on Green Island off the coast of Taiwan. The strain CC-HSB-11 of Muricauda lutaonensis produces zeaxanthin. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Muricauda lutaonensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase == Further reading == * * Category:Flavobacteria Category:Bacteria described in 2009
title: Muricauda lutaonensis
